function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Workplace transmission of SARS-CoV-2 leading to household and community spread","Impact":"Increased risk of infection and local clusters in households and communities","Mitigation":"Implement strict workplace infection control measures and provide support for safe isolation","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV-C disinfection, ventilation improvements","People":"Workers in essential services, residents in crowded neighborhoods","Owner":"Employers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Socio-economic disparities and vulnerability to infection","Impact":"Unequal access to self-isolation, higher risk of exposure, potential for community spread","Mitigation":"Financial support for vulnerable populations, targeted public health interventions, community support networks","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Residents with lower socio-economic indicators, essential workers, immigrant communities","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Architectural design issues contributing to household infections","Impact":"High infection rates among family members due to inadequate ventilation and indoor environment","Mitigation":"Redesign of housing structures for better ventilation and isolation options, education on home ventilation practices","Technologies":"Smart ventilation systems, air quality monitoring, home isolation units","People":"Residents living in open-plan housing, households with limited ventilation","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, government, public health authorities"}]}
